attributes.comment:
My wife and I are in the process of adopting an infant girl from the People's
Republic of China. Because of the long wait between the acquisition of our form I-
171H and actually receiving our daughter, we would be forced to complete a
second form I-600A and again pay the associated costs. An increase in the
costs for these forms places an additional financial burden on our adoption
process. Please be aware that there are many families that have already been
required to pay these fees twice. This duplicate payment will continue for any
family adopting a healthy child from China. Any increase in fees will cause these
families harm.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anthony B. Bennett
